entity_substitution_complete.explanation: All instances of 'Hash Blockchain Limited' have been correctly replaced with 'Digital Finance Corp'. Signature blocks, addresses, and contact details have been updated accordingly. Grammatical consistency has been maintained.

Digital Finance Corp shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Client

jurisdiction_transformed.explanation: Governing law has been changed from Hong Kong to Singapore, and dispute resolution has been updated from HKIAC to SIAC. All references to Hong Kong have been updated to Singapore.
evidence: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Singapore
Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved through binding arbitration under SIAC Rules

liability_reallocation_correct.explanation: Liability clauses have been correctly reversed. Digital Finance Corp now indemnifies the Client, and the limitation of liability has been shifted accordingly.
evidence: Digital Finance Corp shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Client
The Client's total liability to Digital Finance Corp shall not exceed the amount of fees paid by Digital Finance Corp to the Client
